column1: Uchi////Perhaps it was valentines day and hectic so I will have to visit another time and see if it's the same which I hope not. I was not impressed by the experience with the service. The food was however very nicely displayed and very flavorful
column2: creative presentation and originality of food combination. Every course was pretty well designed
column3: except there were some discrepancy with some items in the course which I think the waitress just added to our order since the original course got replaced and later she added those extra items to the bill which I didn't order. She took it off and apologized when I mentioned it. I would love to give it a 5 star but I had a mediocre experience and it didn't live up to the ratings and the hype
column4: will give it a second chance and hopefully it will be better the next time around.
